summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2450 for the improvement of North and West Seventy-seventh Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 26261, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
